sentences.english: But you wouldn't listen! Now we must give an accounting for his blood.
sentences.chinese: 只是你們不肯聽，所以流他血的罪向我們追討。

sentences.english: Yes, I tell you, it will be required of this generation.
sentences.chinese: 我實在告訴你們，這都要向這世代追討。

sentences.english: And then the practical element of how the taxes are collected themselves.
sentences.chinese: 以及之後稅款如何追討的實踐方法。

sentences.english: Red chardonnay was frustrated in the restaurant drink, was the shopkeeper for arrears.
sentences.chinese: 赤霞鬱郁不得志的在酒家喝酒，卻被掌櫃追討欠款。

sentences.english: Investigation shows, folk usurious the malignant event has occurred to recover.
sentences.chinese: 調查顯示，民間追討高利貸的惡性事件已有發生。
